instructions: Tap an episode. For more playback controls, tap the player at the bottom to open the Now Playing screen. Use any of the following controls: Tip: To jump to a specific time in the episode, drag the track position slider below the podcast artwork. Ask Siri. Say something like: Skip ahead 3 minutes. Learn how to ask Siri . Swipe up on the Now Playing screen to see the sleep timer, episode notes, and your Up Next queue.
